title: Diplomat Gordon Sondland says he'll testify to lawmakers on Ukraine
text: Gordon Sondland, the U.S. ambassador to the European Union, said Friday that he will testify on Thursday before House committees leading the impeachment inquiry even though the Trump administration has directed him not to testify. But Sondland said he doesn't control the disposition of documents that the committees have directed him to produce, adding that the State Department has sole authority to produce the documents and he hopes it shares them with the committees before Thursday. On Tuesday, Trump escalated his fight against House Democrats' impeachment inquiry by blocking Sondland from testifying about dealings with Ukraine.
